description: Stand, Store & StreamlineThink ThinView your media on the go with the ultra-thin protective folio and stand in one. Minimal and sleek, this versatile case lets you enjoy your iPad 2 comfortably with multiple viewing angles and a typing mode that's perfect for email and chatting. A Perfect FitThe fashion-inspired case hugs your iPad 2 and protects it from scratches and scuffs, with a cover that folds to protect the screen and an inner lining that's soft and smooth against your device. Lightweight and form-fitting, it slips easily into another bag without bulk.
title: Belkin Slim Folio Case / Cover with Stand for the Apple iPad 4 with Retina Display (4th Generation) & iPad 3 and iPad 2 (Red)
